long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Supercharge your search in page with powerful regex matching.

To use the extension, pin the extension or launch by pressing 
Cmd + Shift + F on Mac or Ctrl + Shift + F if you have Windows/Linux and enter your search term.

If you're a developer who loves using regex to search your code, you should also have the ability to search a webpage with regex. Since Chrome's default 'Find in Page' feature doesn't support regex, I built this extension to fill that gap. There are more features planned, and Iâ€™d love to hear your feedback! Give it a try and let me know your suggestions.
